about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling journey as a space mercenary! Customize your ships with powerful weapons and modules to battle enemy fleets and epic bosses.

The demo version focuses on the action-packed space shooter gameplay of Escape 2 Space.

Instant action

Jump straight into the fight in this Escape 2 Space demo! Select one of the available contract missions and fight to complete it!

Simplified customization

Access to a simplified customization screen to choose the spaceship you want to use, its weaponry and even its colors!

Nervous and strategic gameplay

Fight in a fast-paced action shooter! Avoid incoming bullets and obstacles, and strategize on what weapon to use depending on the challenge you're facing!

The demo doesn't cover

  • The career aspect of the main game, where you action will matter

  • The exploration aspect of the main game, where you'll have to explore space sectors to get new contrats and items

  • The itemization aspect of the game, where you'll manage your own loadout of equipment

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core AMD or Intel processor @ 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950, AMD R9 280 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
